thread.title: Jordan Ayew's boss Tim Sherwood sacked after poor run of results
thread.title_full: Jordan Ayew's boss Tim Sherwood sacked after poor run of results

title: Jordan Ayew's boss Tim Sherwood sacked after poor run of results
text:
13:40 CET Jordan Ayew's boss Tim Sherwood sacked after poor run of results - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana and Sunderland striker Jordan Ayew 
Ghana international Jordan Ayew will work under a new boss after head coach Tim Sherwood was fired on Sunday afternoon. 
Sherwood who took over as head coach of Aston Villa last February led them to the FA Cup final where they lost to Arsenal and also guided them to escape relegations last season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
